body:
it's been almost 1 year since I been on avicus, it was one of the best year of my life,
Ever since ElementalAssasin showed me this server around January and I started getting into it after I got into my first team which is Xenarch. After I left Xenarch, I started to get into Avicus more, I made new friends, learn new stradegy's to pvp, etc.
Avicus is one of my favourite servers on minecraft so far.

Im done summerizing my year on avicus,

Go
Ask
Me
A
Question
Please
<3
